text: Ni shuo:`Wo gaosu nimen zai zhenzhu nali suo shou de baochou you bi zhe geng elie de, hao ma? You deng ren ceng shou zhenzhu de qi jue he qian nu, ta shi tamen-bufen biancheng houzi he zhu, yibufen chongbai emo, zhe deng ren, tamen di diwei shi geng elie de, tamen likai zhengdao shi geng yuan de.'
